title: Error in sign.targets: PE file is already strong-name signed
body:
1. git clone MSBuild
2. cibuild
3. cibuild again

```
C:\MSBuild\Tools\sign.targets(70,5): error : C:\MSBuild\bin\obj\MSBuildTaskHost\x86\Debug\MSBuildTaskH
ost.exe: PE file is already strong-name signed. [C:\MSBuild\src\XMakeCommandLine\MSBuildTaskHost\MSBui
ldTaskHost.csproj]
  Microsoft.Build.Tasks -> C:\MSBuild\bin\x86\Windows_NT\Debug\Output\Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core.dll
C:\MSBuild\Tools\sign.targets(70,5): error : C:\MSBuild\bin\obj\MSBuild\x86\Debug\MSBuild.exe: PE file
 is already strong-name signed. [C:\MSBuild\src\XMakeCommandLine\MSBuild.csproj]
```

Win10 machine, VS 2015 Update 3.

nodes.body: I never sent a PR for this, despite claiming I would. Know the fix.
